product_name: White Sierra Explorer Shorts - Boys' - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Explorer Shorts for boys dry fast to keep your child loving the outdoors during the warm summer months. Nylon river cloth is light and comfortable and works well for hikes and everyday fun outdoors. White Sierra Explorer Shorts include hand pockets and a cargo pocket on the right side. Elastic in back ensures a comfortable fit; UPF sun protection. Special buy.
